description:
Even Takafumi`s uncle has memories he`d rather forget. But he also remembers a rare heroic moment he experienced in the other dimension.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Koushite Ore wa Misemonogoya no Chika ni Buchikomaretanda ga...
So They Threw Me into the Basement of a Freak Show...
こうして俺は見世物小屋の地下にぶち込まれたんだが...
